Row.Text: Gain the Grant Second Wind Commander Ability. Grants a Land Unit within the Command Radius 1 extra attack and 2 movement points.
Gain the Grant Second Wind Commander Ability. Grants a Naval Unit within the Command Radius 1 extra attack and 2 movement points.
Gain the Heroic Assault Ability. Deal direct damage to a unit in the command radius that has the same domain as the commander.

Land Units within the Command Radius gain +5 Healing in enemy and neutral territory.
+50% Yield and HP from pillaging within the Command Radius.

Terrain combat bonuses are doubled, and Infantry Units can move and attack through cliffs.
Land Units within the Command Radius have a +2 Flanking bonus when attacking.
Land Units within the Command Radius have a +2 Flanking bonus when attacking.

Opponents have -2 to Flanking bonuses when attacking Land Units within the Command Radius.
This Commander has +1 Movement while on land and ignores Terrain movement restrictions when packed.

+5% to all Yields except Happiness in a Settlement when stationed on a District.
Land Units within the Command Radius can be upgraded as if in friendly territory, and heal 10 HP when upgraded.
+50% reduction in this Commander's Recovery Time.

Naval Units within the Command Radius deal reciprocal damage when defending against ranged attacks.
Naval Units within the Command Radius have the Splash ability. Enemy Units in tiles adjacent to the target take 25% of the total damage done to the target.
Naval Units within the Command Radius take half reciprocal damage when flanking.
Naval Units within the Command Radius take half reciprocal damage when flanking.

Naval Units can move after unpacking.
